contextId.information: This is hendiadys and emphasizes that the people will "tremble in anguish." (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
The writer is communicating one idea through two words. AT: "What does this terrible anger mean?" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_hendiadys]])
contextId.quote: What does the heat of this great anger mean?
